useCase.name: View Inventory List
useCase.description: As a Manager, I want to view the list of inventory items.

preconditions.precondition: The Manager is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The Manager successfully views the inventory list.

useCase.trigger: Manager requests to view the inventory list.

mainSequence.step: Manager requests inventory list from the Management Interface.
Management Interface retrieves the inventory data.
Inventory Management Module queries the inventory list from the Database.
Database provides the inventory list data to the Inventory Management Module.
Inventory Management Module returns the inventory list to the Management Interface.
Management Interface displays the inventory list to the Manager.
